channel.title: Blog on WorkplaceDudes
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on WorkplaceDudes

item.title: S01:E10 | @ De Pink Elephant, Microsoft Universal Printer, ExpertsLive en nog veel meer
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E10 ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ Episode 10! ðŸ¥³ðŸ¥³ In this episode we talk about Microsoft’s cloud printer solution, namely Universal Print. We also talk about DuVDUG’s meetup at Pink Elephant and the accompanying BBQ. And…. What are we going to do at Experts Live NL? Maybe…. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E09 | Guestspeaker MVP Peter Klapwijk - How to become a MVP, #MEMSummit, Windows Kiosk and more
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E09 In this episode, we have MVP Peter Klapwijk as our guest speaker. In this show we ask Peter all about how he started blogging, how he eventually became MVP and what his favorite soccer team is. We also talk about the MEM summit that was held recently. And also ExpertsLiveNL comes up for air. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.

item.title: S01:E08 | End of the Internet Explorer era, #MEM Update, MD-100 exam and more
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E08 In this episode, we talk about the end of the Internet Explorer era. Richard passed MD-100 and Jeroen passed SC-900. Richard also shows something about Defender for Endpoint on iOS with an in-app VPN option. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E07 | Jan Bakker over his Self Service Tool, Graph Explorer API en more
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E07 Today we have MVP Jan Bakker as our guest. He showcased his fantastic Self Service Tool, talked about Graph Explorer API and much more. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E06 | Microsoft Windows 11 Powers the Future of Hybrid Work
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E06 Last Tuesday, April 5, Microsoft had a “stream” where they introduced a number of new features of Windows 11. Herewith a small recap of the stream. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E05 | Rudy Ooms and the windows.old bug
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E05 In today’s show of the WorkplaceDudes, we have MVP Rudy Ooms and he talks about the bug that he found with the windows.old folder where, after a remote wipe from Intune, the personal Onedrive data was still accessible. During the talks, we had a #MEMBeer as well. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E04 | Edge vs Google Chrome, M365 backup and Windows 11 22H2
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E04 In this new epiosde of the WorkplaceDudes, we talk about a controversial topic: Microsoft Edge vs Google Chrome. In addition, we also talk about the backup of Microsoft 365 and we talk about the first major release of Windows 11 22h2 nicknamed Sun Valley 2. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E03 | Powershell Automation, DevOps and many more
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E03 It’s time for the 3rd episode. In this show we have our first guest speaker, MVP Jeff Wouters. We mainly talk about Powershell automation, DevOps and many more topics related to Microsoft. Would you also like to be a guest on our show? You can register via our website https://workplacedudes.nl

item.title: S01:E02 | HP Connect for Microsoft Endpoint Manager (MEM)
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E02 And already the 2nd show is online. In this episode Jeroen Burgerhout shows a demo regarding HP Connect for Microsoft Endpoint Manager (MEM). Topics that come up are: Why updating a BIOS can be important The connection between HP Connect and MEM And why this can be an added value For more information see: https://admin.hp.com

item.title: S01:E01 | Microsoft Exams and Certificates
item.description: WorkplaceDudes S01:E01 In our very first show we will of course do a little introduction about ourselves. Then we’ll talk about Microsoft exams and certifications. Topics that come up are: Why certified? Preparing for the exam Online or test center? Cross-exam skills Do’s & Don’ts Since this was the first episode for us, we had to get used to it. So sometimes things do go wrong, but that is a learning process for us.

item.title: Website is live
item.description: MicrosoftDudes is live Jeroen had an idea for a while to do something with a vlog/streaming idea. However, the challenge was to find 2 other “dudes” who supported this idea and of course also want to participate. Fortunately, Jeroen had found 2 colleagues who were interested in it. After we talked to our employer SKS Professionals about sponsoring this idea, we got the green light. After this, we needed a nice name for this idea.
